page.title: 08AGRICULTURE 2
page.content: INTENSIVE ARABLE PRODUCES OIL SEED RAPE, SUGAR BEET, CONTRACT PEAS,WHEAT, BARLEY AND POTATOES. THERE IS CONSIDERABLE OVERLAP BETWEEN THE ARABLE FARMEES AND THE MARKET GARDENERS. THE BEST DISTINCTION IS PROBABLY THAT THE LATTER PRODUCE ON A SMALLER SCALE AMD SELL DIRECT TO THE CONSUMER THOUGH EVEN HERE PICK YOUR OWN STRAWBERRIES BLURRS THE DISTINCTION. RECENT CHANGES ARE THE DISAPPEARANCE OF HEDGES AS FIELDS HAVE BEEN MADE LARGER TO ACCOMODATE EVER BIGGER MACHINERY.HIGH EEC INTERVENTION PRICES CURRENTLY FAVOUR CROPS AND SO MUCH OLD PASTURE HAS BEEN DRAINED AND PLOUGHED.THERE IS A STRONG TENDENCY TO SOW IN THE AUTUMN AND OILSEED RAPE HAS INCREASED MUCH IN ACREAGE.PEAS ARR GROWN UNDER CONTRACT TO THE FROZEN FOOD COMPANIES BASED IN GRIMSBY.
